## Extract the locality
```{r example, dpi= 300}
library(magrittr)
library(sf)
acapulco <- rgeomex::extract_locality(cve_edo = "12",
                                      locality = "Acapulco de Juarez")
plot(sf::st_geometry(acapulco))

ageb_acapulco <- rgeomex::extract_ageb(cve_geo = "12",
                                       locality = "Acapulco de Juarez")
ggplot2::ggplot()+
  ggplot2::geom_sf(data = ageb_acapulco$ageb,
                   fill = "gray80",
                   col = "white",
                   lwd = 0.1) +
  ggplot2::theme_void() +
  ggplot2::geom_sf(data = acapulco,
                   fill = NA,
                   col = "black",
                   lwd = .5)
```
